name: Patient Zero (Deepanjali Sarna)
description:
This is a game makes the player embrace his sadistic Anti-Hero Side. This is a reverse zombie survival game wherein the player’s goal is total human extinction. The game is set in the hidden Island of Pandora. Genre: Reverse zombie Survival Target Audience: All Ages Platforms: PC Game Story The game begins in a hospital located in the city of Pandora. The lead character of the game is Patient Zero, he is an illegal, failed human experiment which turned him into a zombie. Zero breaks out of the hospital and starts infecting the civilians with his virus in various methods. The civilians go through different stages of being a zombie after being affected. Zero gains new abilities and mutations after certain levels. The police and the SWAT teams keep attacking Zero and his army of newly formed zombies. Zero has to ability to infect and kill the police and SWAT. Zero has to survive through the game to win. Zero Born with Inhuman regenerative properties – Zero discovers his powers when he accidentally falls while building a tree house with his father. The fall brakes his spine in an instant, and he goes into shock. Little did his parents know about his special powers. They took him to the Local Hospital and the doctors watched his spine heal instantly. The doctors were amazed by what they witnessed. The Government was informed and Zero was immediately Kidnapped and his family killed. The Government secretly ran numerous tests on him and tortured Zero to learn the secrets of his gift. This put his powers into overdrive and awoke a deadly virus within hi and led him to go insane. Zero gets stronger and mutates more with the number of people he infects with his condition. Virus This virus has the ability to spread really fast. Once the virus enters the host it mutates their DNA and they become mindless zombies. Game World The game is set in a fictional city of Pandora. The city has a park, school, hospital, shops and many more places. The city is heavily guarded and away from the civilization. There are a few civilians in the city. Police and SWAT teams are also a part of the city. GAME MECHANICS Zero keeps mutating and his abilities keep upgrading. Zero can attack the NPC’S and convert them to form his own zombie army. The zombie NPC’S can further mutate and attack other NPC’S. 

CONTROLS 

W, A, S, D –MOVEMENT Skill 1- Q Skill 2 –E Skill 3- R Left click- Attack Mouse-Pan around HUD Level Indicator Game time Infected Count Health Points

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2018 by a team of 5 students.

Artists: Aditya Gadi and Deepanjali Sarna
